features: 【Save Space and 0rderly】The magnetic stove top rack adopts a detachable segmented design, with 2 independent functional partitions, which can be combined or disassembled as needed, and the spices are stored in an orderly manner. Create more usable space for your kitchen. The 30" stove top spice rack is perfect for those who want to save space and kitchen organization. It's designed to keep your spices within reach, so you don't have to waste time looking for them while you're cooking.

【Upgrade Magnetic and Zero Installation 】We embed 6 magnets under the upgraded stove top rack to ensure the stability. With its zero installation design, this spice rack can be easily placed on the top of your stove without the need for drilling or screws. If your stove is a non-metal material, you don’t need to worry about it, we also equipped with 7 metal stickers, making it compatible with all types of stove tops, including non-iron metal and plastic material.

【Suitable for Most Stoves】The total size of the stove magnetic shelf is 30*3.5*0.59inch/76*9*1.5cm. The 2-section design of the flexibility spice racks fits both flat stoves and slightly curved stoves, and most stoves in the market. The spices organizer of the silicone material is thin and soft, even if there is a switch on the stove, it is perfectly compatible.If you are unsure whether the spice rack will fit your stove, measure your stove before buying.

【High-quality Silicone】Our kitchen shelves are made of high quality food-grade silicone, which is not only durable and long-lasting, but it's also easy to clean and maintain. If your spices is sprinkled on the shelf, you can clean the magnetic spice rack with warm water. Safe and non-toxic silicone material is high-temperature resistant to 428 ℉(220℃). It can effectively waterproof and moisture-proof. Don't worry about your spices because of high temperature melting and deformation.

【Prevent Spice Drop】The thick magnetic stove top rack with lip around all sides prevents spices from falling, and there is 2 partition to divide the area, which helps to store spices in an orderly manner and category in the kitchen. The bottom of the magnetic stove rack has a non-slip texture design. You don’t have to worry about the spice dropping during the process of cooking. Today and take the first step towards a more organized and efficient cooking experience!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 30 INCHES SILICONE SPICE RACK Are you still struggling with kitchen storage? Still complaining that you can't find the seasoning when you cook? Our new and upgraded spice rack has a reasonably designed size that makes the storage rack compatible with most spices and stoves.Our kitchen shelves are made of high quality food-grade silicone, which is not only durable and long-lasting, but it's also easy to clean and maintain. If your spices is sprinkled on the shelf, you can clean the magnetic spice rack with warm water. Safe and non-toxic silicone material is high-temperature resistant to 428 ℉(220℃). It can effectively waterproof and moisture-proof. Don't worry about your spices because of high temperature melting and deformation.

TWO INSTALLATION METHODS Strong magnetic stickers for lron and any other magnetic. We embed 6 magnets under the upgraded stove top rack to ensure the stability. With its zero installation design, this spice rack can be easily placed on the top of your stove without the need for drilling or screws. Iron sticker suitable for other non-iron stove and plastic stove. If your stove is a non-metal material, you don’t need to worry about it, we also equipped with 7 metal stickers, making it compatible with all types of stove tops, including non-iron metal and plastic material.

SAVE SPACE AND 0RDERLY The magnetic stove top rack adopts a detachable segmented design, with 2 independent functional partitions, which can be combined or disassembled as needed, and the spices are stored in an orderly manner. Create more usable space for your kitchen.The 30" stove top spice rack is perfect for those who want to save space and kitchen organization. It's designed to keep your spices within reach, so you don't have to waste time looking for them while you're cooking.With just one stove top rack, let you say goodbye to the chaos of the kitchen and enjoy cooking every day！

HIGH-QUALITY SILICONE The thick magnetic stove top rack with lip around all sides prevents spices from falling, and there is 2 partition to divide the area, which helps to store spices in an orderly manner and category in the kitchen. The super-strong magnet is embedded in the bottom of the shelf. In order to pack the magnet's suction, please wash it by hand with clean water when cleaning. In order to avoid the magnet falling off, do not put it in the dishwasher.The bottom of the magnetic stove top rack has a non-slip texture design. You don’t have to worry about the spice dropping during the process of cooking. Today and take the first step towards a more organized and efficient cooking experience!

A MUST HAVE STOVE TOP RACK Have you ever used stove racks made of other materials? Like stainless steel? Wood?Our newly upgraded silicone stove top rack is different from the traditional material, silicone shelf is easy to use and clean, and non-slip, high temperature resistance, a full range of protection of your spices, to bring you a new experience.

Swich on Top The spices organizer of the silicone material is thin and soft, even if there is a switch on the stove, it is perfectly compatible. Metal and Plastic on Top 6 magnets are embedded under the spice rack, which can be tightly attached to the metal stove top.If you have a non-metal or plastic stove top, you can also use our iron sheet to paste on the stove top. Curved Stove The magnetic stove top rack adopts a detachable segmented design, with 2 independent functional partitions, which can be combined or disassembled as needed.

Safe Material Our kitchen shelves are made of high quality food-grade silicone, It is not only waterproof and moisture-proof, but also effective against rust. 7 Iron Sheet Stickers Our spice rack package includes 7pcs metal stickers, if your stove top is made of non-metal material, you can use our metal stickers to attach to the stove top for easy connection to the spice organizer. Heat Resistant Safe and non-toxic silicone material is high-temperature resistant to 428 ℉(220℃). Don't worry about your spices because of high temperature melting and deformation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Compliment to any Stove
reviews.reviewText: String magnets. Easy to remove and reattach. Easy to clean. Almost looks like part of the drive. Simple solution. Great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great idea and good product
reviews.reviewText: This fits great and looks nice. Ot doesnt fit my salt and pepper holder, but that is huge and it still is sitting up there nice. And the silicone texture keeps it from falling. Good buy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Just a tad disappointed
reviews.reviewText: I was overly optimistic I think. My stove top is not magnetic. The magnets on the trays and the metal stickers onthe stove work, sort of, but it is so easy for me to move the trays. Nothing is wrong with them. And you might find the trays very useful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Organized and handy!
reviews.reviewText: I have a small galley kitchen with limited cabinet space. This product is a perfect solution to keep my most use spices handy without the countertop clutter. The magnetic strips hold it securely to the stove and the material easily wipes clean. A great value!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Magnets are strong and shelf doesn't move. Adhesive metal disc's ensure that shelves stay put even on plastic surfaces.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love these. Nothing falling anymore and so easy to clean!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The magnets are a bit weak in case of sticking to the surface and it does not work as advertised for curved stoves as in the product description. Maybe it is good for flat ones but not for curved.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s amazing how well it works. I thought maybe if I applied something a little bit bigger that it would topple over, and it never has. Wonderful product! I recommend!
